metadata.title: CVE-2022-1207 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Out-of-bounds read in GitHub repository radareorg/radare2 prior to 5.6.8.This vulnerability allows attackers to read sensitive information fromoutside the allocated buffer boundary.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
